quotes.quote: How can anyone govern a nation that has two hundred and forty six different kinds of cheese?
Good cheese needs good companions.
Never commit yourself to a cheese without having first examined it.
A slice of pie without cheese is like a kiss without a squeeze.
Each sort of cheese reveals a pasture of a different green, under a different sky.
Cheese, like oil, makes too much of itself.
What happens to the hole when the cheese is gone?
Cheese, wine, and a friend must be old to be good.
The misers cheese is wholesomest.
An aristrocracy is like cheese. The older it is the higher it becomes.
It is for the inconsistent, unsteady disciples whose cheese is falling off their cracker.
Beauty is a valuable asset, but it is not the whole cheese.
Give me a good sharp knife and a good sharp cheese and I’m a happy man.
Wine and cheese are ageless companions,like aspirin and aches, or June and moon,or good people and noble ventures.
A cheese may disappoint. It may be dull, it may be naive, it may be oversophisticated. Yet it remains cheese, milk's leap toward immortality.
Cheese for dessert is rather like Paradise lost in that everyone thinks he ought to like it, but still you don't notice too many people actually curling up with it.
Cheese has always been a food that both sophisticated and simple humans love.
A meal without cheese is like a beautiful woman who lacks an eye.
The quicker you let go of old cheese, the sooner you find new cheese.
My whole family is lactose intolerant and when we take pictures we can't say cheese.
A dessert without cheese is like a beauty with only one eye.
The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
When cheese gets its picture taken, what does it say?
